product_name: Chartreuse Umbrella Rig (5 Lures) Chesapake Bay
long_description: The 5 swimbaits in this Umbrella Rig are designed to attract Striped Bass, Bluefish, Salmon and other offshore species. A longtime favorite in the Northeast, Umbrella rig fishing is catching on all over the country. Using the best materials available and our unique Panther Martin Swimbaits, these Umbrella Rigs are quite simply the best Umbrella Rigs on the market, no matter what the cost.
google_categorization: Sporting Goods > Outdoor Recreation > Fishing > Fishing Lures
